channel.title: Dâ€™Andre Collins ITWS Labs
channel.description: This feed publishes updates to my ITWS-1100 lab projects and coursework.

item.title: Lab 1 - Azure VM Setup
item.description: In this lab, I configured my development environment, connected GitHub Desktop, and deployed an Azure virtual machine to host my coursework.

item.title: Lab 2 - HTML Resume
item.description: In this lab, I created a semantic HTML5 version of my resume and styled it using CSS for improved structure and presentation.

item.title: Lab 3 - Personal Website
item.description: In this lab, I began developing my personal website to showcase my labs, projects, and coursework using structured HTML and CSS.

item.title: Lab 4 - RSS and Atom Feeds
item.description: In this lab, I created valid RSS 2.0 and Atom 1.0 XML feeds to publish updates for my ITWS coursework.
